content: The Tiger Relic is one of the Rare Soaks for your Gourds in Black Myth: Wukong. The Soak's ability is rather specialised, useful for specific spell builds or when adopting a particular style.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tiger_Relic.md', within the main section titled 'Tiger Relic'.
The content is as follows:
The Tiger Relic is one of the Rare Soaks for your Gourds in Black Myth: Wukong. The Soak's ability is rather specialised, useful for specific spell builds or when adopting a particular style.
